methods.name: getCurrentSpan
methods.short: Return the average distance between each of the pointers forming the gesture in progress through the focal point.

methods.name: getCurrentSpanX
methods.short: Return the average X distance between each of the pointers forming the gesture in progress through the focal point.

methods.name: getCurrentSpanY
methods.short: Return the average Y distance between each of the pointers forming the gesture in progress through the focal point.

methods.name: getEventTime
methods.short: Return the event time of the current event being processed.

methods.name: getFocusX
methods.short: Get the X coordinate of the current gesture's focal point.

methods.name: getFocusY
methods.short: Get the Y coordinate of the current gesture's focal point.

methods.name: getPreviousSpan
methods.short: Return the previous average distance between each of the pointers forming the gesture in progress through the focal point.

methods.name: getPreviousSpanX
methods.short: Return the previous average X distance between each of the pointers forming the gesture in progress through the focal point.

methods.name: getPreviousSpanY
methods.short: Return the previous average Y distance between each of the pointers forming the gesture in progress through the focal point.

methods.name: getScaleFactor
methods.short: Return the scaling factor from the previous scale event to the current event.

methods.name: getTimeDelta
methods.short: Return the time difference in milliseconds between the previous accepted scaling event and the current scaling event.
